description: Added Zustand for state management, implemented real-time features using WebSockets, and optimized performance with lazy loading and code splitting
Made webhook form for the agent configuration.
Improved backend systems with PHP and Hack using MVC frameworks, supporting up to 1,000 requests per day.
Improved routing efficiency, reducing response times by 15% and optimizing server performance.
Streamlined data flow, boosting system speed and reliability by 20%.
